title: Ex Gold Support main looking for people to play with and climb!
body:
Heyy!
I'm a support main, was in gold last season, haven't really played that much this season. However I am starting to want to climb back again and need an ad to duo with or a team to dynamic que with? 
Main Morgana, Janna, Thresh and Leona. Thanks! 
Message me on this or in game cheers

replies.body: Hey im keen. im a plat ADC main and i got a gold smurf i can play on if ur keen
